<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Fixed Resource Code using the selectedFix</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/code/api/v1/errors/getFixedCode"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Returns a remediated resource code
